text: The 1969–1970 Algerian Championnat National was the 8th season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 16 teams contested the league, with CR Belcourt as the defending champions, The Championnat started on october 5, 1969. and ended on May 10, 1970. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1969-1970 * CS Constantine * JSM Tiaret Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1970-1971 * JS Djijel * USM Annaba ==League table== ==Season statistics== ===Top scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Scorer !Club !Goals |- !|1 |align="left"| Hacène Lalmas |align="left"|CR Belcourt | style="text-align:center;"|18 |- !|2 |align="left"| Rachid Aït Chegou |align="left"|CCS Kouba | style="text- align:center;"|12 |- !|3 |align="left"| Boualem Amirouche |align="left"|CCS Kouba | style="text-align:center;"|12 |- !|4 |align="left"| Arezki Kouffi |align="left"|JS Kabylie | style="text-align:center;"|12 |- !|5 |align="left"| Abdelkader Fréha |align="left"|MC Oran | style="text-align:center;"|11 |- !|6 |align="left"| Kamel Tchalabi |align="left"|USM Alger | style="text- align:center;"|10 |- !|7 |align="left"| Hassan Tahir |align="left"|MC Alger | style="text-align:center;"|10 |- !|8 |align="left"| Ben Tahar |align="left"|USM Annaba | style="text-align:center;"|10 |- !|9 |align="left"| Abdelhamid Salhi |align="left"|ES Sétif | style="text-align:center;"|10 |} ==References== ==External links== *1969–70 Algerian Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons Category:1969–70 in Algerian football Algeria
